definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: The establishment of military rewards and punishments regulation provided guarantee to improve battle effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 而军事赏罚的实行也为提高军队战斗力提供了保障。

sentences.english: ZhangChong feel the combat effectiveness of science and technology, secretly hard study.
sentences.chinese: 张冲感受到了科技的战斗力，偷偷用功钻研。

sentences.english: I'm lucky enough to join a well-oiled team.
sentences.chinese: 我很幸运能加入这么一支充满战斗力的球队。

sentences.english: This idiom is used to describe the powerfulness of an army's capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 这个词是用来形容军队的战斗力十分强大。

sentences.english: Darren Fletcher was satisfied with the pluck and moxie on show in United's battling draw at Stoke City.
sentences.chinese: 弗莱彻满意球队在对斯托克比赛中表现出来的战斗力。

sentences.english: After Zhao implemented the reform, the army's fighting capacity was strengthened and won battles one after the other.
sentences.chinese: 赵国实行改革后，军队的战斗力加强了，连连打胜仗。

sentences.english: The Indian army is using yoga to help condition its soldiers for combat.
sentences.chinese: 印度军方正采用瑜伽训练方式来提升士兵战斗力。

sentences.english: To maintain the new fighting force, knights needed a source of income.
sentences.chinese: 为保持这支新式部队的战斗力，骑士需要有收入来源。

sentences.english: The training of policing skill under battle conditions is an important approach to promote the battle effectiveness of the police.
sentences.chinese: 警务实战技能训练是提高公安民警战斗力的重要途径。

sentences.english: You should on no account overrate the enemy's combat effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 切不可过分估计敌人的战斗力。

sentences.english: The shoulders open up to reveal more repulsors too.
sentences.chinese: 以及肩膀张开来展现更大的战斗力。

sentences.english: McCain has been proving himself a scrappier opponent than many Democrats had assumed he would be.
sentences.chinese: 同时，马侃的战斗力也超乎许多民主党人的预期。

sentences.english: The current party leadership the prime of life, forging ahead in unity and full of fighting.
sentences.chinese: 本届党政领导班子年富力强，团结奋进，富有战斗力。

sentences.english: The explosion of the fort has pulled our enemies’ teeth off。
sentences.chinese: 敌人碉堡的爆炸已经让他们丧失战斗力了。

sentences.english: you're the face, you're the person who's supposed to  keep the troop, you know, the, the rank and file motivated.
sentences.chinese: 你是球队的标志，是保持球队战斗力和激情的主心骨。

sentences.english: Jeet Kune Do is the outcome of his ideas, thought, and fighting experiences.
sentences.chinese: 截拳道是结果他的理念，思想，和战斗力的经验。
